languages.text: {n}Преемники Гектархиуса хоть и были удивлены, но узрели в необычном решении знак: три дня покойный настоятель читал проповедь, три новых главы Ордена — возможно, и истинных реликвий святого Когнация в Просторе осталось всего три. Воодушевленные историческими переменами в жизни планеты, настоятели, ныне зовущие себя Триадой Молота, рьяно взялись за поиск святынь.{/n}

{n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Преемники Гектархиуса хоть и были удивлены, но узрели в необычном решении знак: три дня покойный настоятель читал проповедь, три новых главы Ордена — возможно, и истинных реликвий святого Когнация в Просторе осталось всего три. Воодушевленные историческими переменами в жизни планеты, настоятели, ныне зовущие себя Триадой Молота, рьяно взялись за поиск святынь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon and the three new heads of the Order might point to three being the number of the last genuine relics of Saint Cognatius in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the planet's life, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

{n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon and the three new heads of the Order might point to three being the number of the last genuine relics of Saint Cognatius in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the planet's life, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

{n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

{n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hectarchius' Nachfolger waren zwar überrascht, betrachteten die unorthodoxe Entscheidung aber als Zeichen. Die dreitägige Predigt des verstorbenen Prälaten und die Ernennung der drei neuen Oberhäupter des Ordens könnte darauf hindeuten, dass in der Ausdehnung drei Relikte des Heiligen Cognatius die Zeiten überdauert haben könnten. Von den bedeutsamen Wendungen im Leben des Planeten beseelt, machten sich die Prälaten als 'Dreiklang des Hammers' eifrig auf die Suche nach den heiligen Gegenständen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hectarchius' Nachfolger waren zwar überrascht, betrachteten die unorthodoxe Entscheidung aber als Zeichen. Die dreitägige Predigt des verstorbenen Prälaten und die Ernennung der drei neuen Oberhäupter des Ordens könnte darauf hindeuten, dass in der Ausdehnung drei Relikte des Heiligen Cognatius die Zeiten überdauert haben könnten. Von den bedeutsamen Wendungen im Leben des Planeten beseelt, machten sich die Prälaten als 'Dreiklang des Hammers' eifrig auf die Suche nach den heiligen Gegenständen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şaşkınlıklarına rağmen Hectarchius'un halefleri, bu alışılmadık kararı bir işaret olarak gördü. Merhum piskoposun üç günlük vaazı ve Tarikat'ın başına üç yeni kişinin atanması, Enginlik'te hâlâ kalan hakiki Aziz Cognatius yadigârlarının sayısının üç olduğuna işaret ediyor olabilir. Gezegenin hayatındaki bu önemli değişimlerden enerji alan ve kendilerini artık Çekiç Üçlüsü olarak adlandıran piskoposlar, kutsal nesneleri aramak için hevesle yola koyuldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şaşkınlıklarına rağmen Hectarchius'un halefleri, bu alışılmadık kararı bir işaret olarak gördü. Merhum piskoposun üç günlük vaazı ve Tarikat'ın başına üç yeni kişinin atanması, Enginlik'te hâlâ kalan hakiki Aziz Cognatius yadigârlarının sayısının üç olduğuna işaret ediyor olabilir. Gezegenin hayatındaki bu önemli değişimlerden enerji alan ve kendilerini artık Çekiç Üçlüsü olarak adlandıran piskoposlar, kutsal nesneleri aramak için hevesle yola koyuldu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pesar de su sorpresa, los sucesores de Hectarchius interpretaron la poco ortodoxa decisión como una señal. El sermón de tres días del difunto prelado, junto con el nombramiento de tres nuevos dirigentes para la Orden, podría significar que son tres las reliquias auténticas de san Cognatius que quedan en la Extensión. Enardecidos por los trascendentales cambios en la vida del planeta, los prelados, bautizados como la Tríada del Martillo, emprendieron con entusiasmo la búsqueda de los artefactos sagrados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de su sorpresa, los sucesores de Hectarchius interpretaron la poco ortodoxa decisión como una señal. El sermón de tres días del difunto prelado, junto con el nombramiento de tres nuevos dirigentes para la Orden, podría significar que son tres las reliquias auténticas de san Cognatius que quedan en la Extensión. Enardecidos por los trascendentales cambios en la vida del planeta, los prelados, bautizados como la Tríada del Martillo, emprendieron con entusiasmo la búsqueda de los artefactos sagrados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管这个决定让赫克塔奇乌斯的三位继任者惊讶不已，但他们将这个不同寻常的决定视为某种征兆。赫克塔奇乌斯身故前，曾举行过长达三天的布道，而如今行商浪人又委任了三位教长，这或许意味着圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗留在这片星区的圣物遗产也有三件。在最新任命的鼓舞之下，如今自封为“重锤三教长”的三位大主教开始兴冲冲地搜集起了圣遗物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管这个决定让赫克塔奇乌斯的三位继任者惊讶不已，但他们将这个不同寻常的决定视为某种征兆。赫克塔奇乌斯身故前，曾举行过长达三天的布道，而如今行商浪人又委任了三位教长，这或许意味着圣科尼亚蒂乌斯遗留在这片星区的圣物遗产也有三件。在最新任命的鼓舞之下，如今自封为“重锤三教长”的三位大主教开始兴冲冲地搜集起了圣遗物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les successeurs de Hectarchius ont été surpris par cette décision peu orthodoxe, mais l'ont interprétée comme un signe. Entre les sermons de trois jours du feu prélat et la nomination de trois nouveaux dirigeants à la tête de l'Ordre, il semblait logique que le chiffre trois désigne le nombre de véritables reliques de Saint Cognatius encore présentes dans les Étendues. Stimulés par les événements majeurs altérant la vie même de cette planète, les prélats se sont baptisés la « Triade du Marteau » et sont partis à la recherche des objets sacrés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les successeurs de Hectarchius ont été surpris par cette décision peu orthodoxe, mais l'ont interprétée comme un signe. Entre les sermons de trois jours du feu prélat et la nomination de trois nouveaux dirigeants à la tête de l'Ordre, il semblait logique que le chiffre trois désigne le nombre de véritables reliques de Saint Cognatius encore présentes dans les Étendues. Stimulés par les événements majeurs altérant la vie même de cette planète, les prélats se sont baptisés la « Triade du Marteau » et sont partis à la recherche des objets sacrés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}驚きはしたが、ヘクタルキウスの後継者たちは、その型破りな決定を都合よく「兆し」と受け取った。亡き高位聖職者の三日間の説教と、教団の新しい三人の長の任命――それらを根拠に、エクスパンスにまだ本物の聖コグナティウスの聖遺物が三つ残っているのだろう、と。惑星の情勢が大きく動いたのに乗じて、やつらは今や自分たちを「ハンマーの三柱」などと名乗り、聖遺物探しに意気込んで出発した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Although surprised, Hectarchius's successors saw the unorthodox decision as a sign. The late prelate's three-day sermon, along with the appointment of three new heads of the Order, might point to three being the number of genuine relics of Saint Cognatius still remaining in the Expanse. Energised by the momentous shifts in the life of the planet, the prelates, now styling themselves as the Triad of the Hammer, eagerly set out to search for the sacred objects.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驚きはしたが、ヘクタルキウスの後継者たちは、その型破りな決定を都合よく「兆し」と受け取った。亡き高位聖職者の三日間の説教と、教団の新しい三人の長の任命――それらを根拠に、エクスパンスにまだ本物の聖コグナティウスの聖遺物が三つ残っているのだろう、と。惑星の情勢が大きく動いたのに乗じて、やつらは今や自分たちを「ハンマーの三柱」などと名乗り、聖遺物探しに意気込んで出発した。{/n}
